trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> elements that identify an item of content.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements defined within a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> provides a structured means to refer to an external data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> gli elementi definiti all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> fornisce un modo strutturato per fare riferimento a un elemento di dati esterno.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> class.
Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
A modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> metodo crea una copia modificabile di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per praticità, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`
trans-unit.target: Clonato <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> proprietà sarà `false` origine anche se questo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> è di proprietà `true.`

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: Quando si copiano le proprietà di dipendenza, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (anche se non possono risolvere) ma non la copia non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="null" />.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
Always <see langword="null" />.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.GetSchema%2A> is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.GetSchema%2A> viene fornito per rispettare il contratto del <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> elements that make up this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> elements that make up this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator" /> gli elementi che compongono questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> collection returned will never be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> insieme restituito non sarà mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> non contiene alcun <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> oggetti, la raccolta restituita conterrà zero elementi.

trans-unit.source: The XML reader to use to deserialize the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
Deserializes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> from a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The serialized XML for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> is not valid.
The XML writer to use to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" />.
Serializes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup" /> to a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
<paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
